item.title: Brave ADMX Templates
item.description: BraveADMX Brave, as a company, has failed to release ADMX templates for the brave browser siteing pushing pure registries as the only supported option. As the Brave Browser is build off of Chromium, it should support most, if not all, the same policies from the Chromium and Google Chrome ADMX templates. With that in mind, we’ve modified the Google Chrome ADMX templates to reflect the Brave Browser’s registry path. After some initial troubleshooting and testing, the templatates seem to work.

item.title: Chromium ADMX Templates
item.description: ChromiumADMX Proper ADMX Template for the Chromium Browser Brave, as a company, has failed to release ADMX templates for the Chromium Browser that may be installed at the same time as the Google Chrome templates. With that in mind, we’ve modified the Google Chrome ADMX templates to reflect the Chromium Browser’s registry path and placed in tandum in the Google ADMX Folder in GPO. These Policy Definitions are in a Pre-Alpha state.
